message.body: I'll prob be coming into the city to meet you guys
I just talked to josh about it an hour ago
Haha, he mentioned that was likely going to be the plan to me at like 2
Also, he sent out a mass text
I had been planning on doing something like that anyway, but He and I pretty much confirmed that
I still don't know for sure. Will have a better idea tomorrow night hopefully.
My friend from FL is having trouble solidifying his plans due to work-related priorities
He prob wouldn't have a problem with those plans, though, even if he did end up showing up
oh yeah, I forgot about your visitor
not as odd as yo' face!
the text box gets bigger for no reason
hmm, anywhere you recommend for happy hour on wednesday?
You've been to the city more than me =/
yeah, but you're prolly as experienced as I with the bar scene
Urban Saloon might be an option
Which I might go to regardless of where you guys go, haha
I have no idea where the best happy hours would be.
The bars I know are all craft beer related =/
http://www.publichousephilly.com/home If you want cheap shitty beer
so the concert is at the oval by the art museum
though you could have a character named Al
I can work a character named Al in
you should like your own comment about josh liking his own comments
Then I got distracted, I think
You just friended a Taiwanese dog apparently
btw, still waiting on my reference on cs
I'll get to it when I get to it
Do you just want something like "Yo. He's cool."? Because I suppose I could do that now.
I just wanted to come up with something actually interesting
apparently you can edit on demand though
Editing is easier/more natural for me
which I can do on demand
I like going by inspiration with both writing and smartassery
I am alllll pink and red, except for strategically located areas
Not much. Just enough to remind me, constantly, that I have a sunburn
yeah, I dont' really get sunburn
I have to burn to tan quickly
Otherwise I have to be outside ALL THE TIME to build up any sort of tan
My upper back is the worst right now
If I pull my shoulders back, the skin kind of wrinkles and it's effing painful
or I AM outside all the time
Probably a combination of genetics and more frequent sun exposure
how's the vacation going so far?
was this a planned thing or more just a what the hell thing
The plan was to relax and hang out with my mom
New freckles already seem to be emerging
Someone asked me to look at their resume
So I'll be up for a bit, I suppose
are you some kind of resume expert?
Which is essentially all that resume writing is
I haven't had a resume in years
not really necessary in my field
Bet it couldn't hurt to have one
I have one, it's just not updated
there's a very slight chance that I will have Ally meet us in philly on wednesday
the entire top of my right foot is swollen =/
yeah, you might want to look into that
I think I'm just allergic to bugs
Why do you want to meet up with Ally again? You basically said you have no interest in her.
Is the interest in _her_ or in just having another female to juggle?
but Im not putting much effort into it
yeah, because that is my goal in life
trust me, it's not all it's cracked up to be
it probably won't happen, but I just wanted to through it out there
Dude, you can do whatever you want. It won't be a problem.
I'm not really worried about it
I think you're overdramaticizing the thing with Amy for the sake of your ego.
_You_ really had nothing to do with the situation from my perspective.
If you're concerned over my potential behavior due to "The Amy Incident", I assure you that, from my perspective at least, *you* were virtually immaterial to the situation.
ok, so remove me from the situation
If Amy was acting the same way towards me, even if you weren't there, I'd have acted just as 'weird'
I was reacting to her, not to her interaction with you
you seriously crack me up sometimes
I love how you intentionally provoke me and then act like you don't know what's going on when I respond.
it took me a second just to realize what you were talking about
what? now I am a liar as well?
who do you think I am?
I hate when people do that
I love how you're making a huge deal about this, and acted all confused and innocent when I brought up how you were acting unusually friendly the night of Efi's party
that was like an eternity ago
You were actually cuddling me right in front of Michael
Which you had never done before and have never done since
he was some random guy at a party that you were talking to
so who is making a big deal?
besides, you already busted my balls about it
I will give you the opportunity to retract that last comment
ooop, no the one before that
so you think about these things before you say them?
The implication was there that I would and would have with Amy, had it been an option
what I love is, I make an innocent joke, and you blow it completely out of proportion, and then accuse me of blowing things out of proportion
Even if you were joking, I feel like you believe, to some degree, that I was trying to prevent you and Amy from whatever-the-fuck-you-were-doing
And _that_ is what I was reacting to
so you were reacting to your own assumptions
and this seems perfectly reasonable to you?
If you want to twist it that way, sure. I'm too tired to argue any more.
Please see "too tired to argue any more"
that was one of the more ridiculous things I've heard from you
part of me wants to pretend like it never happened
so now I don't know what to think
if you want to act like nothing has an affect on you, then you have to actually have it not affect you
Did you see the guitar video(s)?
i tried watching it on my phone but I got impatient
You should watch it/them when you get to your laptop
How would you answer "How important is it for you to make physical contact when showing affection for someone?"
Not important, somewhat important, very important? idk
I'd say somewhere between somewhat and very
Cute guy checked out my profile
I should prob check mine, been a while
Gender is a social construct. It's flexible.
that makes it a dude to me
You can be disinterested in a person and still be respectful of their choices.
I don't care what he/she does, Im just not interested
That's fine. Using the pronouns they prefer doesn't make you interested.
She and I are a 90% match apparently
I wear eye liner/eye shadow because I think it makes my eyes stand out more behind my glasses
Otherwise, it's all like beigey-gold tones everywhere
he and I are a 50% match
He and I are a 92% match
but you do like indian food
I love Indian food, movies, culture
which is odd because I thought we were a 80% match or so
I don't know, I haven't dated any.
I...feel like I've met mandi for somet reason
I don't recognize her, but she seems really familiar
For some reason I feel like she's crazy
hey, what does it say my 'replies' is?
yeah, it's green and says often
shit, I did just write this one girl back
I'd rather it say selectively, makes me appear less desperate
Nah, it makes you seem normal/friendly
I'm a little surprised that I have replies selectively
have you heard of Pretty Lights?
I'm surprised I get messages at all, haha
At least it sets the right expectation
there was a point where I wouldnt even message a girl if she 'replied very selectively'
I've messaged guys who have "very selectively". I just have no expectation of a response.
I think I've gained like 10 lbs since coming home
I feel if I message a girl that replies often, and she doesn't respond, I'll just feel worse
why does josh keep calling me?
why not just do that in the first place?
what's next, he's gonna write me a letter?
I can't stop poking myself and watching the skin turn white to tan
Depending on which area I poke
well he is on his phone
I think my mother refers to a band as a group
I use them indiscriminately, I think
ugh, I don't feel like doing anything
I semi just called you a douchebag
and this music isn't very good
I didn't say it was good
I just met her at social wednesday last week
She seems like she might be your type
I'll assume you are referring to the girl I met weds, not the creature in the pic
I talked to her for a bit, which was odd because claire was sitting between us
she was slightly more interesting than claire, but claire did seem a bit tired, or 'cream crackered' as she put it
I was TOTALLY talking about the creature in the picture!
yes, I said knackered and she took it one step further
I'd be more impressed if the "good at" was actually a haiku
I'm sure you'd have a good time with her
is actually Kristin's cousin, who I have also met before
I've bugged kristin to bring her around
one of our parties, she said that she was suppose to come out but ended up getting stood up
Sorry, I only like the pulp-free kind
yeah, the one I said had "approachable good looks"
Isn't that where you found her originally?
What in the world are you trying to do?
If you're trying to upload to imgur, you need to go to imgur.com and upload that way
is what I was trying to do
She's an 82% match for me lol
It seems like she and me-two-years-ago would have gotten along famously
Although I don't think I would ever have used the word "peppier"
I'd see her again, but whatever I'm not pursuing it. we had our shot
She seems far too serious for you
I don't see you ever working out with someone who "spends a lot of time thinking about their 5-year plan"
yeah, she's a bit serious, but she was fun on our date
I don't know if she changed her profile at all from before
My potential visitor might not make it up this week
But he keeps calling me, which is cute =)
he has an amazing phone voice
Your drawl kind of makes me twitch sometimes though
I've always hated my phone voice, but most people hate the sound of their own voice
Your bedroom voice is probably your best, haha
Not sure if I've heard you sing though, so maybe I shouldn't make any rash declarations
my bedroom everything is probably my best
drawl? can you site an example?
You sound kind of rednecky occasionally. But not like northern redneck.
I think it's the way you hold your vowels or something
I can try to pay attention in the future for certain words, but I feel like it's more than that
you've finally managed to make me feel bad about myself
sorry, took a break to play 1-1 volleyball and make mojitos
now I'm thinking of calling NJ girl out of the blue
just because it's so not like me
but then, what if she doesnt answer? that's just awkward
I made you feel bad about yourself?
If you call, leave an apologetic vm "Oh.. wow. Sorry. I was trying to call my friend [Name close in the alphabet to yours]. I, uh, hope you're doing well."
